name: Slimetastic Mutant Prevention Squad
description:
Evil mutant slime aliens are escaping the lab! Stop them before they escape!

Use power relays to transmit power from the central pylon to defensive turrets. Use your electric pulse to set of spike traps. Power your defenses!

Supports up to 4 players (with gamepads)!

Controls:

  • Gamepad joysticks pr WASD keyboard - Movement
  • Gamepad face button down ('A', 'cross', etc) or Space Bar- Pick up relays
  • Gamepad face button left ('X', 'square', etc) or 'F' - Emit a pulse that activates spike traps
  • Gamepad 'Start' or 'Escape' - Main menu

Credits:

  • Jesper Back
  • Hampus Back
  • Aksel Jensen
  • Karolina Jensen

Made during the Global Game Jam 2018.
